title: GZbridge compilation will not work with nodejs >=0.11.8

content.raw:
The reason is that node_object_wrap.h is deleted in node.h which is mainly used in source.

Therefore info in installation instruction needs to be updated or headers inclusion restructured. I guess you will solve it by using responsible headers in the headers :). 

If I have time and nobody takes it up I will provide a pull request. 

I do not know what is counted as bug, thats why I choose enhancement.
content.html:
The reason is that node_object_wrap.h is deleted in node.h which is mainly used in source.

Therefore info in installation instruction needs to be updated or headers inclusion restructured. I guess you will solve it by using responsible headers in the headers :).

If I have time and nobody takes it up I will provide a pull request.

I do not know what is counted as bug, thats why I choose enhancement.
